parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds an column at given position. It returns the index of the newly added column. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> _ctrl [[lnbAddColumn]] position </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> _ctrl: [[Control]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] or [[nil]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> [[lnbAddColumn]] [idc([[Number]]) or [[Control]],position([[Number]])] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [idc([[Number]]) or [[Control]],position([[Number]])]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] or [[nil]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbAddColumn]] 0.8;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbAddColumn]] [105,0.8];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lnbAddArray]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetColumnsPos]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetData]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbSize]], [[lnbText]], [[lnbValue]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
